main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Pottstown, Pennsylvania on July 28, 1968, involving a bright light in the sky.
interesting points: The observer described the light as changing colors from bright red to bright white to pale orange-red., The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes and the light followed a tight triangular flight pattern., A local congressman was involved in inquiries about the sighting., No photographs were taken of the event., The final conclusion categorized the sighting as a possible hot air balloon.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED], local newspaper editor, reliability judged to be good.
